content.raw: sorry for being vague, it was in response to [this comment](#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/1008/implement-bullet-screw-joint/diff#comment-1430686) about issue #1108.  We should consider changing `SetUpperLimit` and `SetLowerLimit` to return bool when we make the change to using `SetUpperLimit` and `SetLowerLimit` in place of `SetHighStop` and `SetLowStop`.
content.html: sorry for being vague, it was in response to this comment about issue #1108. We should consider changing SetUpperLimit and SetLowerLimit to return bool when we make the change to using SetUpperLimit and SetLowerLimit in place of SetHighStop and SetLowStop.
